short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automation and productivity solutions for LI that allow you to keep the “personal touch” that is needed on that platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automation and productivity solutions for LI that allow you to keep the “personal touch” that is needed on that platform.

Label your connections.

Send broadcasts to your labelled connections.

Send automated birthday wishes!

Send automated "Congratulations on New Job Announcements".

Send automated "Automated Happy Anniversary messages for work and job anniversaries".

Automated "Out of Office Replies".

Automated Replies based on keyword inputs.

Much more to come!
